home.title: IT Architect, Developer & Bug Hunter
home.who_am_i_1: I'm freelance web developper and IT Architect based in Madrid. I'm passionate and permanent watching about new technologies.
home.who_am_i_2: My expertise is more focused on back-end technologies, however I'm open to front-end and mobile technologies.
home.who_am_i_3: Are you looking for an expert to design a new project? Do you want to evoluate an existing project? or maybe you just want a third party opinion?
home.who_am_i_4: Surely we can collaborate! In any case don't hesitate to write me, I will contact you as soon as possible.
